effect: Effect: Search your Deck for a Jutsu card with "Requirements: Tailed Beast Form", reveal it and move it to your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"I've got a bad feeling about this…"

name: Tayuya (State 1)
effect:
Sound | Female | The Four Sound Ninja | Name: Tayuya | Mental Power: 2 | GROWTH
[SONG OF THE NORTH GATE]
When a Mission is played, you can discard the top card of your Deck. In that case, discard 1 of your opponent's Chakra.
"Bring it, punks."

name: Tayuya (State 2)
effect:
Sound | Female | The Four Sound Ninja | Name: Tayuya | State 2 | Mental Power: 2 | MASTERY | REINFORCEMENT
[SONG OF SILENCE]
Sacrifice: "Tayuya (State 1)"
Valid: While you have no cards in your hand, your opponent's activated Ninja effects cost an additional 1 to use.
"Never thought I'd use second state here."

name: Temari
effect:
Sand | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | SURGE
[EXCELLENT TACTICIAN]
Valid: During the Exchange of Jutsu, you can change the positions of the Ninjas in this Ninja's Team.
"Make sure not to cry in front of me this time."

name: Tenten
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Female | Mental Power: 2
[WEAPON CACHE]
During your Mission Phase, you can select 1 of your opponent's face-up Earth Battle Rewards. In that case, move the selected card to your hand and your opponent wins 1 Battle Reward.
"No luck, he got away."

name: The City of Pain
effect:
Permanent
Effect: When this Mission is put in play, if you have 2 or more "Rinnegan" and/or "Akatsuki" Ninjas, move 2 cards from the bottom of your Deck to your hand.
Effect: At the end of the turn, if your opponent put in play 2 or more Ninjas, move your Turn Marker up by 1.
"Konan… When I stop the rain, seek out the intruder with your jutsu."

name: The Fangs of Pain
effect:
Requirements: "Rinnegan" + "Animal"
Effect: Move your Turn Marker up by 1.
Combination ("Rinnegan"): Move 1 card from the bottom of your Deck to your hand.
"Are the doggies bound to a self-replication summoning jutsu?"

name: The Fourth Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Satoosa | Male | Mental Power: 2
[TELEPORTATION]
Valid: During the Exchange of Jutsu, you can remove this Ninja from the game. In that case, move this Ninja card back into play at the end of the turn.

name: The Great Naruto Bridge
effect:
Target: 1 "Counter" Mission card being played of 1 in-play card
Effect: Negate the target's effect text. Then, move the top card of your Deck to your Chakra area. (This Mission does not count towards your 1 Mission per turn)
"Nothing. Let's go."

name: The Third Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Satoosa | Male | Mental Power: 3
[FOR THE GREATER GOOD]
During the Exchange of Jutsu, you can remove the top 7 cards of your Deck from the game. In that case, give 1 Damage to 1 Ninja Battling against this Ninja. You can activate this effect as many times as you like.
"This is it, the End!"

name: The Time of Pain
effect: Effect: If you have 2 or more "Rinnegan" and/or "Akatsuki" Ninjas, you can move your Turn Marker up by 1. Then, move 1 card from the bottom of your Deck to your hand.
"Pain… That name is an alias that denotes all six of us."

name: The Wings of Pain
effect:
Requirements: "Rinnegan"
Target: 1 Jutsu being played
Effect: If your Turn Marker is odd, change the effect of the target to the following: Move your Turn Marker down by 1.
"Yes, but that's not all. At the same time… Summoning Jutsu!"

name: Toad Mouth Trap
effect:
Target: 1 Jutsu being played
Effect: Negate the target
Combination ("Ninja Toad"): The user gets +2/+2 during this turn.
"You're inside the stomach of a toad."

name: Tracking Orders
effect: Effect: Move all of your Ninjas with Tracking into the user's Team in any position.
"All right, let me explain the team rosters for our partols."

name: Tsunade
effect:
Leaf | Satoosa | Female | Medical | Mental Power: 3
[LEAF's ELITE]
When this Ninja is put in play, you can heal 1 of your Ninjas. In that case, you can injure 1 of your opponent's Ninja with an Entrance cost equal to or less than the healed Ninja's.
Valid: Your Mission cards cannot be affected by your opponent's effect.
"To protect… My hometown…the Leaf Village…!"

name: Uhei
effect:
Leaf | Animal | Ninja Dog
[FOCUSED TRACKER]
Valid: When this Ninja's Team wins any Victory while Battling against a Tracked Ninja, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.
"Let's work together…"

name: Yamato
effect:
Leaf | Anbu | Mental Power: 3
[PLANNING]
During the Exchange of Jutsu, if you have Ninjas with a combined Mental Power of 12 or more, you can move 1 Jutsu or Mission card from your Discard Pile to your hand.
"…I see I can't hold back any longer…I'm sorry…"

name: Yurinojou
effect:
Land of Greens | Male | Mental Power: 1
[TREE TACTICS]
Valid: This Ninja gets +1/+1 while your opponent has 3 or more face-up Battle Rewards.
Valid: At the start of your turn, you can turn 1 of your opponent's Battle Rewards face up.
"Allow me to avenge Kikunojou."
